bibl.title: Coptic Studies in Honor of Walter Ewing Crum
bibl.note: I. P. Lond. Inv. 2185. A letter of expostulation. Provenance unknown, fifth century. - II. Inv. 2181. A wedding present. Provenance unknown, sixth-seventh century.
Bell H.I., Two Private Letters of the Byzantine Period.
Coptic Studies in Honor of Walter Ewing Crum (Boston, 1950) pp. 251-254.
